name: BLOODLESS
description:
⎛⎝(•ⱅ•)⎠⎞

You and your friend get kidnapped during a paranormal investigation by a vampire! Luckily for you, he’s a huge biology nerd! Answer his questions about the circulatory system correctly, and you two can go home unscathed.

Yet another game made for my class. Hopefully, I'll get around to making more personal projects in the future. Though I doubt anyone outside of close friends and classmates will play this, please inform me of any bugs you find! My coding is far from perfect and this is only my second complete game. Have fun!
